sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default ({components, ...props}) => <MDXTag name="wrapper"  components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"mac"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h1" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#mac"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Mac`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"i-dont-have-development-environment-setup-up-yet"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#i-dont-have-development-environment-setup-up-yet"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`I don't have development environment setup up yet:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Update (or download) Xcode in Software Update section in AppStore app`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Open the terminal (in Applications/Utilities), copy, paste, and run with return `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`/usr/bin/ruby -e "\$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install)"`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`In the terminal run `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`curl -L https://git.io/n-install | bash`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Run `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`brew install yarn --without-node`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Run `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`brew install git`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Install Create React App for web `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`npm install --global create-react-app`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Install Create React App for native platforms (iOS, Android) `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`npm install --global create-react-native-app`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Install Views `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`npm install --global @viewstools/use`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"i-dont-have-a-project-created-yet"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h3" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#i-dont-have-a-project-created-yet"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`I don't have a project created yet:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Create your React web(DOM) project `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`create-react-app my-app`}</MDXTag>{` or React Native project `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`create-react-app my-app`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Go to the project directory, type `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`cd`}</MDXTag>{` (with space after cd) and drag project folder on the terminal window`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Run `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`use-views`}</MDXTag>{` to enable Views on your project`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Ensure all dependencies are installed `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`yarn`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`To start the project run `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`yarn start`}</MDXTag>{` - if it's a web project it will open in the browser if it's a native project it will open iOS simulator`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"if-you-working-on-a-react-native-project-only-ios-android-you-need-to-also"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#if-you-working-on-a-react-native-project-only-ios-android-you-need-to-also"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`If you working on a React Native project only (iOS, Android) you need to also`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Install Xcode from App Store`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Open Xcode and follow installation steps to get all the modules (we need iOS simulator)`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Run `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`brew install watchman`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`To get expo simulator for native run `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`yarn global add exp`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`To install expo ios `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`exp install:ios`}</MDXTag>{` (you might need to run `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`sudo xcode-select -s /Applications/Xcode.app`}</MDXTag>{`)`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`To start project run `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`yarn start`}</MDXTag>{` - you will get a QR code and URL. You can scan the code with your mobile or copy the code`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`In a new tab (CMD+t) run `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`expo ios`}</MDXTag>{` - it will open the simulator`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Swipe to the right on the simulator screen and open Expo app`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Click on the clipboard shortcut in Terminal and your project will open`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"windows-for-react-dom"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h1" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#windows-for-react-dom"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Windows for React DOM`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Download NodeJS from `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"https://nodejs.org/en/"}}>{`https://nodejs.org/en/`}</MDXTag>{` and install it.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Download and install Yarn `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"https://yarnpkg.com/lang/en/docs/install/"}}>{`https://yarnpkg.com/lang/en/docs/install/`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Download and install GIT `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"https://gist.github.com/derhuerst/1b15ff4652a867391f03#file-windows-md"}}>{`https://gist.github.com/derhuerst/1b15ff4652a867391f03#file-windows-md`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Open the terminal (in Start/Program Files/Accessories/Command Prompt).`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Go to the project directory, type `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`cd`}</MDXTag>{` (yes, with space after cd) and drag project folder on the terminal window`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`You might be missing dependencies, so run `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`yarn`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`To start the project run `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`yarn start`}</MDXTag>{` - if it's a web project it will open in the browser`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Happy building! You are all set.
In case if you run into any road blocks reach out with questions via Slack at `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://slack.viewsdx.com/"}}>{`https://slack.viewsdx.com/`}</MDXTag>{` and tag @dario or @tombrewsviews`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
